author.name: Silicon Florist’s links arrangement for July 23 » Silicon Florist

content.html: [...] wp-openid 2.2.0 released Will Norris of Vidoop has released version 2.2.0 of the OpenID plugin for WordPress. This version includes “support for Email Address to URL Transformation - now you can use an email address anywhere you normally use an OpenID.” EAUT! [...]
